DOC.brief_title: Strength Training Study Survivors Breast Gynecologic Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: As result cancer treatment , survivor breast gynecologic cancer report deficit physical psycho-social health . In cancer survivor exercise show improve fitness , increase bone density lean body mass , enhance self-esteem , reduce fatigue . These change positive effect survivor 's physical functioning quality life . However , study examine effect strength training study aim determine optimal exercise prescription population . Therefore , purpose study compare two strength training prescription ( once-a-week vs. twice-a-week strength training ) determine prescription ( ) result great benefit survivor . It hop result study lead well understanding strength train improves health survivor help inform future exercise guideline population .
DOC.criteria: Female Survivor Breast Gynecologic Cancer Completed Primary Treatment ( hormone treatment ok ) 18 year age old Physician 's Permission Participate High Risk Individuals ( determine questionnaire ) Secondary Health Problems could increase risk participate ( Includes limit : Uncontrolled angina/hypertension , heart failure , osteoporosis , brain metastasis , history seizure ) .
